function.description: Returns a string, XML node or a list of XML nodes from the specified XML node as indicated by the string XPath locator. For more information about the XPath syntax and available xpath functions look here: http://www.w3schools.com/xsl/xpath_intro.asp

example.title: Usage
example.header: Assuming we have an XML file note.xml which contains the following:
example.code: < note id="1"> < to>Tove< /to> < from>Jani< /from> < heading>Reminder< /heading> < comment>This was sent to James as well< /comment> < comment>John has not responded to the invitation< /comment> < body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body> < /note>
< ?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>< body>Don't forget me this weekend!< /body>
